WorkItem.Description:
Im writing an excel file based on a template that has two sheets. Before writing the file I delete the second sheet. The PHPExcel class throws a notice saying invalid index 1 during write. It seems that it was trying to write 2nd sheet when its already been deleted.
 
Proposed fix: change active sheet to next available when current active sheet has been deleted
 
Workaround: After calling removeSheetByIndex(), call setActiveSheetIndex() to manually change active sheet that exists
 
Thanks!
:)
WorkItem.Summary: PHP Invalid index notice on writing excel file when active sheet has been deleted
